sentences.en: He now controls the largest retail development empire in southern California.
sentences.cn: 他现在掌管着加州南部最大的零售发展企业。

sentences.en: It is the end product of exhaustive research and development.
sentences.cn: 这是全面研发后的最终成品。

sentences.en: Jaron Lanier coined the term "virtual reality" and pioneered its early development.
sentences.cn: 杰伦·拉尼尔创造了“虚拟现实”这个词，并成为推动其早期发展的先驱人物。

sentences.en: Money will also go into local development projects in Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 钱也会用于越南的地方发展项目当中。

sentences.en: Most development has been concentrated in and around cities.
sentences.cn: 土地开发主要集中在城市及周边地区。

sentences.en: Police said there had been a significant development in the case.
sentences.cn: 警方说此案已经有了重大进展。

sentences.en: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
sentences.cn: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

sentences.en: The 1985 federal budget allocated $7.3 billion for development programmes.
sentences.cn: 1985年的联邦预算将73亿美元拨给了开发项目。

sentences.en: The Bush Foundation has funded a variety of faculty development programs.
sentences.cn: 布什基金会已经资助了许多教员发展项目。

sentences.en: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.cn: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

sentences.en: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
sentences.cn: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

sentences.en: The problem was to safeguard sites from encroachment by property development.
sentences.cn: 问题是要保护遗址免受房地产开发商的侵占。

sentences.en: They identified six plants as having potential for development into pharmaceutical drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们验明6种植物有可能提炼出药物麻醉剂。

sentences.en: This money is intended for the development of the tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱准备用于旅游业的开发。

sentences.en: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting.
sentences.cn: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

sentences.en: What are your plans for the development of your company?
sentences.cn: 你打算怎样来发展壮大自己的公司？

words.tran_cn: 发达的（国家或地区）；成熟的
开发；进步；使成长；使显影

phrases.tran_cn: 开发史；成长历程；发展进程
发展进程，显色法；开发流程，开发程序
未来的发展前景，未来发展

trans.tran_cn: 发展，成长，研制，开发，发展阶段，新进展，新建住宅区
trans.tran_en: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced
